# Raven Docs

> AI-native knowledge management platform with MCP server for agent integration.

## Overview

Raven Docs is a documentation and task management platform that provides:
- Knowledge management with real-time collaboration
- GTD-based task and project management
- AI agent integration via Model Context Protocol (MCP)
- 100+ tools for agents to interact with workspaces

## Quick Start for AI Agents

### MCP Connection

Connect to Raven Docs via MCP:

```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "raven-docs": {
      "url": "https://YOUR_INSTANCE/api/mcp-standard",
      "transport": "http",
      "headers": {
        "Authorization": "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"
      }
    }
  }
}
```

### Authentication

All requests require an API key in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer raven_sk_...
```

Get an API key from Settings > API Keys in the Raven Docs UI.

### Key MCP Endpoints

| Endpoint | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| POST /mcp-standard/initialize | Initialize connection |
| POST /mcp-standard/list_tools | List all available tools |
| POST /mcp-standard/search_tools | Search for tools by query |
| POST /mcp-standard/call_tool | Execute a tool |
| POST /mcp-standard/list_categories | List tool categories |

### Tool Categories

| Category | Tools | Description |
|----------|-------|-------------|
| page | 14 | Create, read, update, delete pages |
| task | 11 | Task management and GTD workflow |
| space | 10 | Workspace organization |
| project | 7 | Project management |
| search | 2 | Full-text search |
| memory | 4 | Persistent agent memory |
| research | 3 | Autonomous research jobs |
| goals | 6 | Goal tracking across horizons |

### Common Tools

**Pages:**
- `page_list` - List pages in a space
- `page_get` - Get page content
- `page_create` - Create a new page
- `page_update` - Update page content
- `search_query` - Full-text search

**Tasks:**
- `task_list` - List tasks
- `task_create` - Create a task
- `task_update` - Update task status/details
- `task_complete` - Mark task complete

**Memory:**
- `memory_ingest` - Store information
- `memory_query` - Query stored memories

**Research:**
- `research_create` - Start research job
- `research_status` - Check job status
- `research_get_report` - Get completed report

## Documentation Structure

- /mcp/overview - MCP server introduction
- /mcp/quickstart - 5-minute setup guide
- /mcp/authentication - Auth details
- /mcp/tools/* - Individual tool documentation
- /api/overview - REST API reference
- /api/authentication - API key setup
- /api/endpoints/* - Endpoint documentation
- /concepts/* - Core concepts (workspaces, spaces, pages, tasks)

## Example: Search and Read

```typescript
// Search for relevant tools
const { tools } = await mcp.searchTools({ query: "create page" });

// Call the tool
const result = await mcp.callTool("page_create", {
  workspaceId: "ws_123",
  spaceId: "space_456",
  title: "New Page",
  content: { type: "doc", content: [] }
});
```

## Error Codes

| Code | HTTP | Description |
|------|------|-------------|
| UNAUTHORIZED | 401 | Invalid API key |
| FORBIDDEN | 403 | Insufficient permissions |
| NOT_FOUND | 404 | Resource not found |
| RATE_LIMITED | 429 | Too many requests |
